doc:
Barbara Harris (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_Harris_(actress) 0 Barbara Densmoor Harris (July 25, 1935 – August 21, 2018) was an American actress. She appeared in such movies as A Thousand Clowns, Plaza Suite, Nashville, Family Plot, Freaky Friday, Peggy Sue Got Married, and Grosse Pointe Blank. Harris won a Tony Award and was nominated for an Academy Award. She also received four Golden Globe Award nominations. Barbara_Densmoor_Harris ( July_25_,_1935 – August_21_,_2018 ) was an_American_actress . She appeared in such_movies as A_Thousand_Clowns , Plaza_Suite , Nashville , Family_Plot , Freaky_Friday , Peggy_Sue_Got_Married , and Grosse_Pointe_Blank . Harris won a_Tony_Award and was_nominated for an_Academy_Award . She also received four_Golden_Globe_Award_nominations .
